about.title: About Me
about.description: Hello! I'm Jianyu Chen, a passionate software architect. I specialize in cloud-native technologies, distributed system design, and DevOps practices. I graduated from Guilin University of Electronic Technology with a degree in E-commerce and have extensive experience in technical management and architectural design. Currently, I am the founder of Duyun Haoyungo E-commerce Co., Ltd., dedicated to creating efficient and reliable technical solutions.

programming.title: Programming Languages
items: Experienced with Gin, Gorm, Grpc-go frameworks

cloud.title: Cloud Native Technologies
items: Experienced in cloud-native architecture and Kubernetes
Proficient in distributed system architecture design
Practical experience in system observability (IaC, FinOps)

projects.title: Projects
projects.supportDescription: If you find this project helpful, you can support us in the following ways:

rideflow.title: RideFlow
rideflow.description: Whether you're commuting daily, enjoying a weekend ride, or training professionally, RideFlow is your perfect cycling companion.

edgebox.title: EdgeBox
edgebox.description: Edge computing toolbox offering AI LLM download, deployment, and execution capabilities.

jobs.title: Founder
jobs.description: Responsible for the company's overall technical strategy and product planning, leading the team to develop and maintain core business systems.

jobs.title: Technical Architecture Lead
jobs.description: Responsible for the company's entire system infrastructure design, promoting the establishment of the technical committee and managing daily operations. Led the construction of Jackery's digital cloud-native platform and promoted the development of portable energy storage products.

jobs.title: Technical Director
jobs.description: Responsible for the company's entire supply chain system architecture design and global deployment solutions, promoting the intelligence of the supply chain system.

jobs.title: Architecture Architect
jobs.company: Shenzhen Ping An Information Technology Co., Ltd.
jobs.description: Responsible for the overall architecture design, technology selection, and development process formulation of the C-end project of Ping An Smart Elderly Care Platform.

jobs.title: Development Team Leader
jobs.description: Responsible for the technical development and team management of the e-commerce platform.

jobs.title: Senior Development Engineer
jobs.description: Responsible for the development of core functional modules of the Flash Sale project and project progress management, developing Dal components and other infrastructure.

contact.title: Contact Me
contact.description: If you are interested in my work or have any questions, please feel free to contact me anytime.
